```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(sf)
library(tmap)
```

### Read in SF trees data

```{r}
trees <- read_csv(here("data", "sf_trees", "sf_trees.csv"))
```


### Basic wrangling reminders

find top 5 trees by legal status, wrangle, graph

```{r}
top_5_status <- trees %>% 
  count(legal_status) %>% 
  drop_na(legal_status) %>% 
  rename(tree_count = n) %>% 
  relocate(tree_count) %>% 
  slice_max(tree_count, n = 5)
```
